Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CardRuleDecorator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApolloRuleDecorator  
    ArtemisRuleDecorator  
    AthenaRuleDecorator  
    AtlasRuleDecorator  
    Board
    Game board class that contains cells of the board.
    Card
    Card class used to store sequence of both standard moves and custom move
    Cell
    Cell class keeps track of levels and workers in Board game.
    ChronusRuleDecorator  
    Deck
    Deck class manages card choice.
    DemeterRuleDecorator  
    GameOverMessage
    GameOverMessage is a MoveMessage.
    HephaestusRuleDecorator  
    HestiaRuleDecorator  
    MinotaurRuleDecorator  
    Model
    Model (Model View Controller pattern) class contains all the information about the game, such as board, players and rules
    MoveMessage
    MoveMessage class is the server's response to the client after it has sent it a PlayerMove.
    PanRuleDecorator  
    Player
    This class contains all the information about a player: player's Card, player color, two pointer to his Worker and PlayerTurn
    PlayerMove
    PlayerMove class is sent to server by client to show his move.
    PlayerMoveEnd
    PlayerMoveEnd is a PlayerMove sent to server by client when he wants to end his turn
    PlayerTurn
    PlayerTurn class is created to store an entire turn of a player until he sends a PlayerMoveEnd.
    PoseidonRuleDecorator  
    PrometheusRuleDecorator  
    SeleneRuleDecorator  
    StandardRuleDecorator
    Management of normal play with move-build-end
    Step
    Step class is used in PlayerTurn class to store every move made by the player so that he can perform the right sequence of moves, standard or custom that depends on his card
    Turn
    Turn class represents one round of the game from first player to the last one in order of play.
    Worker
    Workers are game pieces.
    ZeusRuleDecorator
